snippet.title: Apollo 3000: Wild Space - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1507440/Apollo_3000_Wild_Space

Become a mercenary in FPS, explore space during various quests and upgrade your spaceship and weapons to face a new threat from beyond the boundaries of the known universe.
